tc:description.tc:p: Tests compiled manually in 2018 and 2019, re-packaged in 2022.
2022-02-18 : CMSMcQ : split mechanically into five parts to allow staged release.
2022-02-18 : CMSMcQ : work through adding test cases and results, adding comments, and making cosmetic changers. Use 'dummy' elements to mark places where parse trees are needed (almost everywhere).
2022-02-09 : CMSMcQ : work through adding test cases and results, adding comments, and making cosmetic changers. Use 'dummy' elements to mark places where parse trees are needed (almost everywhere).
2022-02-08 : CMSMcQ : translate old test-strings document into test-catalog format
2019-04-29 : CMSMcQ : copy to 2019, resume work collecting grammars from Grune and Jacobs.
2018-04-06 : CMSMcQ : made first version of teststrings.xml, improvising an XML vocabulary for it.
Supply positive and negative test cases manually for each grammar.
Create parse trees for positive test cases.
For each grammar, create more systematic collections of positive and negative cases.
Grammars 1-20 have test cases and are ready for use.
Grammars 21-102 will be added real soon now.
